rules.natural: If FurnitureCo has approval for the QualityStandard, then FurnitureCo either uses the OnlineMarketplace platform or increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine
Provided that FurnitureCo partners with a LogisticsCompany, then FurnitureCo does not use PhysicalStores as a platform
Under the condition that FurnitureCo develops a MobileApp platform, FurnitureCo does not use PhysicalStores as a platform
FurnitureCo either expands to InternationalMarkets, or partners with a LogisticsCompany, or develops a MobileApp platform
Should FurnitureCo hire SupplyChainExperts consultants, then FurnitureCo does not join the RetailAlliance association
FurnitureCo either hires SupplyChainExperts consultants or invests in WarehouseAutomation
Given that FurnitureCo invests in WarehouseAutomation, FurnitureCo does not join the RetailAlliance association
If FurnitureCo does not have approval for the QualityStandard, then FurnitureCo uses PhysicalStores as a platform
Whenever FurnitureCo does not increase production of its EcoFriendlyLine, FurnitureCo joins the RetailAlliance association

facts.natural: FurnitureCo does not use the OnlineMarketplace platform
FurnitureCo does not expand to InternationalMarkets

target.natural: FurnitureCo increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine

FurnitureCo increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine
FurnitureCo does not join the RetailAlliance association
FurnitureCo increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine

natural_facts.A3: FurnitureCo uses PhysicalStores as a platform
natural_facts.G: FurnitureCo increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine

(A1 ∨ G).natural: FurnitureCo either uses the OnlineMarketplace platform or increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine

(A2 → (A1 ∨ G)).natural: If FurnitureCo has approval for the QualityStandard, then FurnitureCo either uses the OnlineMarketplace platform or increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that FurnitureCo partners with a LogisticsCompany, then FurnitureCo does not use PhysicalStores as a platform

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: FurnitureCo either partners with a LogisticsCompany or develops a MobileApp platform

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: Under the condition that FurnitureCo develops a MobileApp platform, FurnitureCo does not use PhysicalStores as a platform

(A6 ∨ (A4 ∨ A5)).natural: FurnitureCo either expands to InternationalMarkets, or partners with a LogisticsCompany, or develops a MobileApp platform

(A8 → ¬A7).natural: Should FurnitureCo hire SupplyChainExperts consultants, then FurnitureCo does not join the RetailAlliance association

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: FurnitureCo either hires SupplyChainExperts consultants or invests in WarehouseAutomation

(A9 → ¬A7).natural: Given that FurnitureCo invests in WarehouseAutomation, FurnitureCo does not join the RetailAlliance association

(¬A2 → A3).natural: If FurnitureCo does not have approval for the QualityStandard, then FurnitureCo uses PhysicalStores as a platform

(¬G → A7).natural: Whenever FurnitureCo does not increase production of its EcoFriendlyLine, FurnitureCo joins the RetailAlliance association

A2.natural: FurnitureCo has approval for the QualityStandard

G.natural: FurnitureCo increases production of its EcoFriendlyLine

¬A1.natural: FurnitureCo does not use the OnlineMarketplace platform

¬A3.natural: FurnitureCo does not use PhysicalStores as a platform

¬A6.natural: FurnitureCo does not expand to InternationalMarkets

¬A7.natural: FurnitureCo does not join the RetailAlliance association
